titles.title: Declaring the office of Speaker of the House of Representatives to be vacant.
Declaring the office of Speaker of the House of Representatives to be vacant.

action.text: QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE - Mr. Gaetz rose to a question of the privileges of the House and offered the resolution. The Chair directed the Clerk to report the resolution. Upon examination of the resolution, the Chair determined that the resolution did constitute a question of the privileges of the House.
Mr. Cole moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 208 - 218 (Roll no. 518).
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 757.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 210 (Roll No. 519).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution declares the office of the Speaker of the House of Representatives to be vacant.
